name: Storage Warehouse to Receiving
script:
# type: ignore
try:
    # Get parameters from the doc
    docs = frappe.form_dict.get('docs')
    if not docs:
        frappe.throw("No document data provided")

    doc = json.loads(str(docs))
    parameters = doc.get('parameters', [])

    # Extract warehouse parameters
    warehouse_from = None
    warehouse_to = None

    for param in parameters:
        if param.get('parameter') == "warehouse_from":
            warehouse_from = param.get('value')
        elif param.get('parameter') == "warehouse_to":
            warehouse_to = param.get('value')

    if not warehouse_from or not warehouse_to:
        frappe.throw(
            "Both warehouse_from and warehouse_to parameters are required")

    # Get the connection from the doc
    connection = frappe.get_doc("Modbus Connection", doc.get('connection'))
    if not connection:
        frappe.throw("Modbus Connection not found")

    # Get the signals from the connection's child table
    signal_from = None
    signal_to = None

    for signal in connection.signals:
        if signal.signal_name == warehouse_from:
            signal_from = signal
        elif signal.signal_name == warehouse_to:
            signal_to = signal

    if not signal_from:
        frappe.throw(
            f"Signal {warehouse_from} not found in connection {connection.name}")
    if not signal_to:
        frappe.throw(
            f"Signal {warehouse_to} not found in connection {connection.name}")

    # Write TRUE to both signals using the connection
    connection.write_signal(signal_from, True)
    connection.write_signal(signal_to, True)

    # Set success result in frappe.flags
    frappe.flags.status = "success"
    frappe.flags.value = f"Successfully set signals for {warehouse_from} and {warehouse_to}"
    frappe.flags.error = None

except Exception as e:
    frappe.log_error(f"Error in storage_warehouse_to_receiving: {str(e)}")
    frappe.flags.status = "error"
    frappe.flags.value = None
    frappe.flags.error = str(e)

name: Staging to Receiving
script:
# Get context from the action
context = frappe.flags.modbus_context
if not context:
    frappe.throw("No context provided")
    
device = context.get('device')
params = context.get('params', {})

bin_number = params.get('bin_number')
if not bin_number:
    frappe.log_error("Bin number not provided", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("Bin number required")
    
frappe.logger().info(f"ü§ñ Starting staging to receiving sequence for bin {bin_number}")

# Read cycle running status
cycle_running = device.read_signal("CYCLE_RUNNING")
if not cycle_running:
    frappe.log_error("PLC cycle not running", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("PLC cycle not running")
    
# Set pick bin and destination signals
device.write_signal(f"PICK_BIN_{bin_number}", True)
device.write_signal("TO_RECEIVING_STA_1", True)

frappe.response["message"] = {
    "status": "success",
    "value": f"Initiated staging to receiving sequence for bin {bin_number}"
}

name: Receiving to Staging
script:
# Get context from the action
context = frappe.flags.modbus_context
if not context:
    frappe.throw("No context provided")
    
device = context.get('device')
params = context.get('params', {})

bin_number = params.get('bin_number')
if not bin_number:
    frappe.log_error("Bin number not provided", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("Bin number required")
    
frappe.logger().info(f"ü§ñ Starting receiving to staging sequence for bin {bin_number}")

# Read cycle running status
cycle_running = device.read_signal("CYCLE_RUNNING")
if not cycle_running:
    frappe.log_error("PLC cycle not running", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("PLC cycle not running")
    
# Set pick bin and source signals
device.write_signal(f"PICK_BIN_{bin_number}", True)
device.write_signal("FROM_RECEIVING", True)

frappe.response["message"] = {
    "status": "success",
    "value": f"Initiated receiving to staging sequence for bin {bin_number}"
}

name: Assembly to Staging
script:
# Get context from the action
context = frappe.flags.modbus_context
if not context:
    frappe.throw("No context provided")
    
device = context.get('device')
params = context.get('params', {})

bin_number = params.get('bin_number')
if not bin_number:
    frappe.log_error("Bin number not provided", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("Bin number required")
    
frappe.logger().info(f"ü§ñ Starting assembly to staging sequence for bin {bin_number}")

# Read cycle running status
cycle_running = device.read_signal("CYCLE_RUNNING")
if not cycle_running:
    frappe.log_error("PLC cycle not running", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("PLC cycle not running")
    
# Set pick bin and source signals
device.write_signal(f"PICK_BIN_{bin_number}", True)
device.write_signal("FROM_ASSEMBLY", True)

frappe.response["message"] = {
    "status": "success",
    "value": f"Initiated assembly to staging sequence for bin {bin_number}"
}

name: Monitor Sequence
script:
# Get context from the action
context = frappe.flags.modbus_context
if not context:
    frappe.throw("No context provided")
    
device = context.get('device')

# Check for error signal
error_state = device.read_signal("PICK_ERROR")
if error_state:
    frappe.log_error("Pick error detected", "Staging Robot Error")
    frappe.throw("Pick error detected")
    
# Read completion signals
to_receiving = device.read_signal("PICK_TO_RECEIVING_COMPLETE")
to_staging = device.read_signal("PICK_TO_STAGING_COMPLETE")
to_assembly = device.read_signal("PICK_TO_ASSEMBLY_COMPLETE")

if to_receiving:
    status = "Staging to receiving complete"
elif to_staging:
    status = "Movement to staging complete"
elif to_assembly:
    status = "Staging to assembly complete"
else:
    status = "Sequence in progress"
    
frappe.logger().info(f"ü§ñ Sequence status: {status}")

frappe.response["message"] = {
    "status": "success",
    "value": status
}

name: Pick List to Assembly
script:
# Pick List to Assembly

# Get context from the action
context = frappe.flags.modbus_context
if not context:
    frappe.throw("No context provided")
    
device = context.get('device')
params = context.get('params', {})

# Get bin number from Pick List warehouse
pick_list = frappe.get_doc("Pick List", frappe.form_dict.doc)
if not pick_list.locations:
    frappe.msgprint("‚ùå No locations found in Pick List")
    frappe.throw("No locations found in Pick List")
    
warehouse = pick_list.locations[0].warehouse
bin_number = warehouse.replace("Pick Bin ", "")  # Extract "01" from "Pick Bin 01"

frappe.msgprint(f"ü§ñ Starting assembly pick sequence for bin {bin_number}")

# Check cycle running
cycle_running = device.read_signal("CYCLE_RUNNING")
if not cycle_running:
    frappe.msgprint("‚ùå PLC cycle not running")
    frappe.throw("PLC cycle not running")
    
# Start the sequence
device.write_signal(f"PICK_BIN_{bin_number}", True)
device.write_signal("TO_ASSEMBLY_STA_1", True)

# Monitor for in-process signal
in_process = device.read_signal("PICK_TO_ASSEMBLY_IN_PROCESS")
if not in_process:
    frappe.msgprint("‚ùå Pick sequence did not start")
    frappe.throw("Pick sequence did not start")
    
frappe.msgprint("‚úÖ Pick sequence initiated successfully")

frappe.response["message"] = {
    "status": "success",
    "value": f"Assembly pick sequence started for bin {bin_number}"
}
